text:
[Verse]
City lights are shining bright
Stars above the night so wide
Feel the rhythm take us high
Dancing till the morning light

[Verse 2]
Hearts are beating in the dark
Lost in whispers from the spark
Hold me tight and don't let go
In the moonlight we will glow

[Chorus]
Dancing with the moon tonight
Spinning under silver light
Feel the music set us free
Dancing you and me

[Verse 3]
City sleeps but we stay up
Drinking love from paper cups
Every step we move and sway
Chasing dreams till break of day

[Bridge]
Echoes of the night remain
In our hearts like sweet champagne
Lost in moments we create
With the stars we won't be late

[Chorus]
Dancing with the moon tonight
Spinning under silver light
Feel the music set us free
Dancing you and me
title: Dancing with the Moon
